name: The Adventures of Ghostie
description:
Description:

The Adventures of Ghostie is a relaxed atmosphere with some challenging platforming. Join Ghostie and his friends as they journey to acquire the key. You'll need to gather all of Ghosties pals together and combine their unique abilities to progress through the level. Change characters at the toy boxes that act as safe havens placed around the map. Have fun and relax.

Just remember above all, there are no Easter eggs.


Controls:

  • A-D: Move
  • W: Jump
  • S: Interact
  • Hold S: Return to toy box :)

Details:

This game was made in 72 hours as part of Wowie Jam 3.0. The theme for the jam "Failure Is Progress". Single person team. I had a bit less time this jam but still feel good about what I was able to do in that limited time.
